{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3630124,"name":"Mason","username":"comicsans","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/comicsans/{size}/192112_2.png","created_at":"2025-05-20T14:49:47.059Z","cooked":"

Hi guys, I made a guide for my team on how to program an FRC robot. I am a 4th year senior on my team and I needed a way to pass the knowledge down, so I hope this guide helps whoever ends up reading it.

I would love some feedback on it!

edit:4th year robotics student and senior xDD

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DMp1ZqzaLNj9CzdIEbfEdjj1DOePfNHhwf5NEjGn7FE/edit?tab=t.0

Second, this is your fourth year being a senior?!?!?!?! /j

Zakk_J:

Second, this your fourth year being a senior?!?!?!?!

You probably just blew through it in a single year but I feel I got a lot more out of fifth grade after the third time through so I’m willing to cut some slack here…
